participant_1.background:
I have a soft spot for my parents and sweets.
i love watching sitcoms on television.
i like to play soccer , draw and read asterix.
My favorite websites are those that help me with my addiction recovery and those that offer suspense novels.
No, I prefer to wear comfortable clothes.

participant_2.background:
I dropped the dogs off at the kennel before heading to my parents' house.
I play the guitar while I wear comfortable clothes and write my stories.
unfortunately , my family lives across the country from me.
i am in a very intimate and loving relationship.
i need a wheel chair to get around.

content.text: Hey!
Hi there! How are you today?
I am doing well. I just finished reading a book. What are you up to today?
I just dropped my dogs off at the kennel. I am going to visit my parents later.
That sounds nice. I hope you have a good visit.
Thanks! I am looking forward to it.
Do you like to read?
Yes, I love to read. I am currently reading a book of short stories.
That sounds interesting. I love short stories.
Me too. They are a great way to relax and escape reality for a little bit.
I agree. Do you like to watch movies?
Yes, I love to watch movies. I watch a lot of movies on Netflix.
Me too. I love Netflix. I watch a lot of TV shows too.
What are some of your favorite TV shows?
I like to watch sitcoms. Some of my favorites are Friends, Seinfeld, and The Office.
I love those shows too! I also like to watch reality TV.
I don't watch a lot of reality TV. I prefer to watch scripted shows.
To each their own. I like to watch reality TV because it is so dramatic and funny.
I agree. It can be very funny.
It is. I love to watch it with my friends
